languages.text: "Опустошительная буря... сколь громкое название для груды отбросов, возглавляемый дерзкой сукой. Спесивая дрянь считала, что может заигрывать с законами Комморры, дабы вывести кабал из-под протекции Черного сердца. Никто не отвергает нашу милость без последствий".

"The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."
languages.original_text: "Опустошительная буря... сколь громкое название для груды отбросов, возглавляемый дерзкой сукой. Спесивая дрянь считала, что может заигрывать с законами Комморры, дабы вывести кабал из-под протекции Черного сердца. Никто не отвергает нашу милость без последствий".

traits.locale_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a big name for a pile of garbage led by a snarky bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could flirt with the laws of Commorragh to get the Kabal out from under the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a big name for a pile of garbage led by a snarky bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could flirt with the laws of Commorragh to get the Kabal out from under the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Der plündernde Sturm ... Ein großer Name für einen Haufen Müll unter der Führung einer hochnäsigen Schlampe. Die winselnde Hure dachte, sie könnte die Gesetze von Commorragh beugen, um die Kabale dem Schutz des Schwarzen Herzens zu entreißen. Niemand lehnt unsere Gunst ohne Konsequenzen ab."
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."

traits.locale_text: "Der plündernde Sturm ... Ein großer Name für einen Haufen Müll unter der Führung einer hochnäsigen Schlampe. Die winselnde Hure dachte, sie könnte die Gesetze von Commorragh beugen, um die Kabale dem Schutz des Schwarzen Herzens zu entreißen. Niemand lehnt unsere Gunst ohne Konsequenzen ab."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: “狂风阴谋团……呵，那个傲慢的臭婊子，手下带着这么一群杂碎，居然敢起这么响亮的名字。那个哭哭啼啼的可怜虫，她竟敢以为她能违背科摩罗的法律，以为能从黑心阴谋团的保护之下抽身而出？所有胆敢拒绝我们恩惠的人，都要付出代价。”
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."

traits.locale_text: “狂风阴谋团……呵，那个傲慢的臭婊子，手下带着这么一群杂碎，居然敢起这么响亮的名字。那个哭哭啼啼的可怜虫，她竟敢以为她能违背科摩罗的法律，以为能从黑心阴谋团的保护之下抽身而出？所有胆敢拒绝我们恩惠的人，都要付出代价。”
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: « La Tempête ravageuse... Un nom prestigieux qui désigne un amas de déchets sous le contrôle d'une garce hautaine. Cette misérable pensait qu'elle pouvait détourner les lois de Commorragh pour soustraire la Kabale à la protection du Cœur Noir. Personne ne refuse notre faveur sans en subir les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."

traits.locale_text: « La Tempête ravageuse... Un nom prestigieux qui désigne un amas de déchets sous le contrôle d'une garce hautaine. Cette misérable pensait qu'elle pouvait détourner les lois de Commorragh pour soustraire la Kabale à la protection du Cœur Noir. Personne ne refuse notre faveur sans en subir les conséquences. »
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: «La Tempestad Asoladora... un nombre muy grandioso para una banda de inútiles liderados por una puta altiva. La muy imbécil se creía que podría manipular las leyes de Commorragh para sacar a su Kábala de la protección del Corazón Negro. Nadie rechaza nuestro favor sin consecuencias».
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."

traits.locale_text: «La Tempestad Asoladora... un nombre muy grandioso para una banda de inútiles liderados por una puta altiva. La muy imbécil se creía que podría manipular las leyes de Commorragh para sacar a su Kábala de la protección del Corazón Negro. Nadie rechaza nuestro favor sin consecuencias».
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: 「略奪の嵐…傲慢な女に率いられるゴミどもの一団にしては立派すぎる名だな。泣き言ばかり言う愚か者は、彼女が黒き心臓の保護から陰謀団を引き抜くためにコモラフの法を曲げかねないと思っていたようだ。我々の好意を無下に拒絶する者はいない」
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."

traits.locale_text: 「略奪の嵐…傲慢な女に率いられるゴミどもの一団にしては立派すぎる名だな。泣き言ばかり言う愚か者は、彼女が黒き心臓の保護から陰謀団を引き抜くためにコモラフの法を曲げかねないと思っていたようだ。我々の好意を無下に拒絶する者はいない」
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga... Kendini beğenmiş bir kancığın yönettiği bir çöp yığını için fazla gösterişli bir isim. Kabal'ı Kara Yürek'in himayesinden çıkarmak için Commorragh kanunlarını bükebileceğini sanan yeni yetme, aşağılık solucan. Bizim lütfumuzu reddedenler, sonuçlarına katlanır."
languages.original_text: "The Reaving Tempest... Such a grand name for a pile of rubbish led by a haughty bitch. The snivelling wretch thought she could bend the laws of Commorragh to extract the Kabal from the protection of the Black Heart. No one rejects our favour without consequence."

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga. Kendini beğenmiş bir kancığın yönettiği bir çöp yığını için fazla gösterişli bir isim. Kabal'ı Kara Yürek'in himayesinden çıkarmak için Commorragh kanunlarını bükebileceğini sanan yeni yetme, aşağılık solucan. Kimse bizim lütfumuzu, sonuçlarına katlanmadan reddedemez."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
